text: The flag of Aa en Hunze () has green field, with an all-encompassing yellow St. Andrew's Cross, coming from the flag corners; on the hoist side a yellow three-leafed lily crown. It was adopted 9 July, 1998. The flag is based on the municipal coat of arms and consists of a green background with a yellow cross. A yellow lily crown is depicted on the left side of the flag. ==References== Aa en Hunze
title: Flag of Aa en Hunze
